actionButton.description: A button that triggers an action, often used in cards
actionButton.textTitle: Enter text or the ID of a content element (ex: #!builtin_text-myid)
actionButton.title: Action Button

card.description: A card message with a title with optional subtitle, image and action buttons.

carousel.description: A carousel is an array of cards
carousel.title: Carousel

image.description: A message showing an image with an optional title
image.labelDesc: Some platforms require to name the images.
image.permissionDenied: You don't have permission to upload files for this bot. Talk to your team owner.
image.title: Image

singleChoice.description: Suggest choices to the user with the intention of picking only one (with an optional message)
singleChoice.itemTitle: The title of the choice (this is what gets shown to the user)
singleChoice.itemValue: The value that your bot gets when the user picks this choice (usually hidden from the user)
singleChoice.title: Single Choice

text.description: A regular text message with optional typing indicators and alternates
